channel.title: AccessiTech Blog
channel.description: Explore expert-written articles, tools, and tips to help you build better, more inclusive digital products.
channel.item:
AI for Coding Accessibility https://accessi.tech/blog/AI-for-Coding-Accessibility 2025-04-08 How developers with disabilities use AI like Copilot to code through chronic pain—where it excels (boilerplate, error fixing), where it fails, and why human judgment still rules. How developers with disabilities use AI like Copilot to code through chronic pain—where it excels (boilerplate, error fixing), where it fails, and why human judgment still rules. undefined
Yellow text on dark blue background saying, AI for Coding Accessibility, How Tools Like Copilot Help Me Ship Code Despite Chronic Pain
AccessiTech LLC

item.title: Building a More Accessible Future Through Design and Technology
item.description: Conor, founder of AccessiTech LLC and a disability advocate, shares how lived experience with Psoriatic Arthritis drives his mission to make tech inclusive. Offering audits, mentorship, and open-source tools, he bridges the gap between accessibility theory and real-world solutions. Join the movement for a web that works for all.
item.excerpt: Conor, founder of AccessiTech LLC and a disability advocate, shares how lived experience with Psoriatic Arthritis drives his mission to make tech inclusive. Offering audits, mentorship, and open-source tools, he bridges the gap between accessibility theory and real-world solutions. Join the movement for a web that works for all.
item.media:description: Dark blue text on yellow background saying, Building a More Accessible Future Through Design and Technology

channel.item:
How AccessiTech Meets You Where You Are https://accessi.tech/blog/How-AccessiTech-Meets-You-Where-You-Are 2025-04-03 Most ‘accessible’ tech fails disabled users. AccessiTech’s services (audits, QA, mentorship) fix that—because compliance isn’t enough. Here’s how we rebuild inclusion. Most ‘accessible’ tech fails disabled users. AccessiTech’s services (audits, QA, mentorship) fix that—because compliance isn’t enough. Here’s how we rebuild inclusion. undefined
Black text on pink background saying "Accessibility Isn't One-Size-Fits-All How AccessiTech Meets You Where You Are"
AccessiTech LLC

Introduction to WCAG - What It Is and Why It Matters https://accessi.tech/blog/Introduction-to-WCAG-What-It-Is-and-Why-It-Matters 2025-05-29 Learn what WCAG is, why web accessibility matters, and how it impacts users, laws, and inclusive design practices. Start building accessible websites today. Learn what WCAG is, why web accessibility matters, and how it impacts users, laws, and inclusive design practices. Start building accessible websites today. undefined
Dark blue text on yellow background saying, Introduction to WCAG, What it is and Why it Matters
AccessiTech LLC

The Four Principles of Accessibility (POUR) https://accessi.tech/blog/The-Four-Principles-of-Accessibility-POUR 2025-06-12 Discover the four foundational principles of web accessibility—Perceivable, Operable, Understandable, and Robust (POUR)—with practical examples and tips for building inclusive digital experiences. Discover the four foundational principles of web accessibility—Perceivable, Operable, Understandable, and Robust (POUR)—with practical examples and tips for building inclusive digital experiences. undefined
Four colored blocks labeled Perceivable, Operable, Understandable, Robust
AccessiTech LLC

channel.title: WCAG Explained
channel.description: Learn about the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) and how to implement them effectively.
channel.item:
1.1.1 - Non-text Content https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-1-1-Non-text-Content-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.1.1 (Non-text Content)—what it means, why it matters, and how to provide accessible alternatives for images, icons, and more. This guideline ensures accessible alternatives for images, icons, and other non-text content. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.1.1 Explained, Non-text Content"
AccessiTech LLC

1.2.1 - Audio-only and Video-only (Prerecorded) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-2-1-Audio-Video-Prerecorded-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.2.1 (Audio-only and Video-only, Prerecorded)—what it means, why it matters, and how to make media content accessible. This guideline ensures audio-only and video-only content is accessible with captions or transcripts. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.1 Explained, Audio-only and Video-only (Prerecorded)"
AccessiTech LLC

1.2.2 - Captions (Prerecorded) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-2-2-Captions-Prerecorded-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.2.2 (Captions, Prerecorded)—what it means, why it matters, and how to make video content accessible with captions. This guideline ensures prerecorded video content is accessible with captions. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.2 Explained, Captions (Prerecorded)"
AccessiTech LLC

1.2.3 - Audio Description or Media Alternative (Prerecorded) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-2-3-Audio-Description-Media-Alternative-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.2.3 (Audio Description or Media Alternative, Prerecorded)—what it means, why it matters, and how to make video content accessible for users who are blind or have low vision. This guideline ensures video content is accessible for users who are blind or have low vision with audio descriptions or media alternatives. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.3 Explained, Audio Description or Media Alternative (Prerecorded)"
AccessiTech LLC

1.2.4 - Captions (Live) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-2-4-Captions-Live-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.2.4 (Captions, Live)—what it means, why it matters, and how to make live video content accessible with captions. This guideline ensures live video content is accessible with captions. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.4 Explained, Captions (Live)"
AccessiTech LLC

1.2.5 - Audio Description (Prerecorded) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-2-5-Audio-Description-Prerecorded-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.2.5 (Audio Description, Prerecorded)—what it means, why it matters, and how to make prerecorded video content accessible for users who are blind or have low vision. This guideline ensures prerecorded video content is accessible with audio descriptions. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.5 Explained, Audio Description (Prerecorded)"
AccessiTech LLC

1.2.6 - Sign Language (Prerecorded) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-2-6-Sign-Language-Prerecorded-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.2.6 (Sign Language, Prerecorded)—what it means, why it matters, and how to make video content accessible with sign language interpretation. This guideline ensures prerecorded video content is accessible with sign language interpretation. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.6 Explained, Sign Language (Prerecorded)"
AccessiTech LLC

1.2.7 - Extended Audio Description (Prerecorded) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-2-7-Extended-Audio-Description-Prerecorded-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.2.7 (Extended Audio Description, Prerecorded)—what it means, why it matters, and how to make video content accessible for users who are blind or have low vision. Requires extended audio descriptions for prerecorded video, aiding users who are blind or have low vision. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.7 Explained, Extended Audio Description (Prerecorded), Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.7 Explained"
AccessiTech LLC

1.2.8 - Media Alternative (Prerecorded) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-2-8-Media-Alternative-Prerecorded-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.2.8 (Media Alternative, Prerecorded)—what it means, why it matters, and how to provide a full text alternative for synchronized media. Requires a full text alternative for synchronized media, ensuring accessibility for users who cannot access audio or video content. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.8 Explained, Media Alternative (Prerecorded)"
AccessiTech LLC

1.2.9 - Audio-only (Live) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-2-9-Audio-Only-Live-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.2.9 (Audio-only, Live)—what it means, why it matters, and how to make live audio content accessible. Ensures live audio content is accessible, for example by providing live captions. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.2.9 Explained, Audio Only (Live)"
AccessiTech LLC

1.3.1 - Info and Relationships https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-3-1-Info-and-Relationships-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.3.1 (Info and Relationships)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure information and relationships are programmatically determined or available in text. This guideline ensures information and relationships are programmatically determined or available in text. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.3.1 Explained, Info and Relationships"

1.3.2 - Meaningful Sequence https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-3-2-Meaningful-Sequence-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.3.2 (Meaningful Sequence)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure content is presented in a logical order for all users. This guideline ensures content is presented in a logical order for all users. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.3.2 Explained, Meaningful Sequence"
AccessiTech LLC

1.3.3 - Sensory Characteristics https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-3-3-Sensory-Characteristics-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.3.3 (Sensory Characteristics)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure instructions don’t rely on shape, color, or sound alone. This guideline ensures instructions do not rely on shape, color, or sound alone. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.3.3 Explained, Sensory Characteristics"
AccessiTech LLC

1.3.4 - Orientation https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-3-4-Orientation-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.3.4 (Orientation)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure content is not restricted to a single display orientation. This guideline ensures content is not restricted to a single display orientation. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.3.4 Explained, Orientation"
AccessiTech LLC

1.3.5 - Identify Input Purpose https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-3-5-Identify-Input-Purpose-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.3.5 (Identify Input Purpose)—what it means, why it matters, and how to help browsers and assistive tech identify the purpose of input fields. Helps browsers and assistive technologies identify the purpose of input fields, improving usability and accessibility. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.3.5 Explained, Identify Input Purpose"
AccessiTech LLC

1.3.6 - Identify Purpose https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-3-6-Identify-Purpose-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.3.6 (Identify Purpose)—what it means, why it matters, and how to help browsers and assistive tech identify the purpose of user interface components beyond just input fields. Helps browsers and assistive technologies identify the purpose of user interface components, enhancing accessibility. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.3.6 Explained, Identify Input Purpose"
AccessiTech LLC

1.4.1 - Use of Color https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-4-1-Use-of-Color-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.4.1 (Use of Color)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure information is not conveyed by color alone. This guideline ensures information is not conveyed by color alone. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.4.1 Explained, Use of Color"
AccessiTech LLC

1.4.10 - Reflow https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-4-10-Reflow-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.4.10 (Reflow)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure your content works on any screen size. This guideline ensures content works on any screen size or orientation. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.4.10 Explained, Reflow"
AccessiTech LLC

1.4.11 - Non-text Contrast https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-4-11-Non-text-Contrast-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.4.11 (Non-text Contrast)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure all visual elements are distinguishable. This guideline ensures user interface components and graphical objects have sufficient contrast for visibility. undefined

This guideline ensures content remains readable when users adjust text spacing for better readability. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.4.12, Text Spacing"
AccessiTech LLC

1.4.13 - Content on Hover or Focus https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-4-13-Content-on-Hover-or-Focus-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.4.13 (Content on Hover or Focus)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure popups and tooltips are accessible. This guideline ensures tooltips and popups are accessible, dismissible, and do not interfere with content. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.4.13, Content on Hover or Focus"
AccessiTech LLC

1.4.2 - Audio Control https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-4-2-Audio-Control-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.4.2 (Audio Control)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure users can control audio that plays automatically. This guideline ensures users can control audio that plays automatically. undefined

1.4.3 - Contrast (Minimum) https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-1-4-3-Contrast-Minimum-Explained 2025-07-01 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 1.4.3 (Contrast Minimum)—what it means, why it matters, and how to ensure text is readable for everyone. This guideline ensures text is readable against its background for all users. undefined

This guideline ensures text remains readable when users zoom or increase font size. undefined

This guideline ensures text is real and not just an image for accessibility. undefined

This guideline ensures all text is real and not just an image. undefined
Blue text on yellow background saying, "Web Content Accessibiilty Guiedlines (WCAG) 1.4.9 Explained, Images of Text (No Exception)"
AccessiTech LLC

This guideline ensures all functionality is accessible using only a keyboard. undefined

2.3.1 - Three Flashes or Below Threshold https://accessi.tech/wcag/WCAG-Guideline-2-3-1-Three-Flashes-or-Below-Threshold-Explained 2025-07-03 A practical guide to WCAG Guideline 2.3.1 (Three Flashes or Below Threshold)—what it means, why it matters, and how to avoid content that flashes more than three times in any one second period.
